title: Zealot Gaming Amateur League Tournament

embed.description: In order to sign up your Team or Organization for the Zealot Gaming Amateur Leauge Tournament, visit the following link . Enter your teams details and you will be contacted soon. Ensure you fill out all your details correctly otherwise your application may be ignored.

body:
Zealot Gaming is hosting an Amateur League Tournament for players ranging from Bronze to Diamond, designed to bring prosperity and
growth to Oceania as a whole. The tournament will feature a large prize pool with the winning team being awarded official
Chiefs LoL Esports merchandise. The event will be held over 3 days, with the finals being live-streamed via Twitch and shoutcasted
by some of your favorite Oceanic personalities.

For more information regarding rules and registering your team, click here. http://www.zealotgaming.com/entry.php?b=366

Registration closes on the 19th of March at 12AM Australian Eastern Daylight Time.

Also if you get a chance to go check out some of the Facebook groups that we are apart off!
https://www.facebook.com/groups/551505681620785/?ref=br_tf
https://www.facebook.com/groups/summonerssociety/422176541282612/?ref=notif&notif_t=group_activity

replies.body: Looks good :D will def check out the games{{champion:23}}
